General.Name: Yingkou Fengguang Advanced Material Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Yingkou Fengguang Advanced Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production and sales of chemical additives for polymer materials. It offers alkyl phenol, neat antioxidants, one pack additives, ethylbenzene dehydrogenation catalyst, triethyl aluminum, polymerization catalysts, and antioxidants blends. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Yingkou, China.
